title: #170: HIV for Victory (@JeffScott101
itunes:title: HIV for Victory with Jeff Scott
description: Jeff Scott had me over to his West Hollywood apartment to tell me the story of his HIV. How he got it, how he's managed to live with it for 30 years, how it's affected his life, how he's been treated by others, and about the friends he's lost. It's one of the most interesting podcasts I've done. You should share it with everybody.
